text: numbala aturin tama biriyanta (ovunge mavvarunta samana kota) lihar prakasa karanno (ambusæmi æsuren ven va sitinno) niyata vasayenma ovun movunge mavvarun noveti. movunge mavvaru movun prasuta kala aya misa næta. tavada niyata vasayenma movuhu pilikul sahagata prakasayak ha musavak pavasati. tavada niyata vasayenma allah samava dennaya. ati ksamasiliya
